panels.description: Indicates whether all nodes are healthy
panels.title: Nodes status

panels.description: Indicates whether Vault is currently unsealed
panels.title: Seal status

panels.description: The number of peers in the raft cluster configuration
panels.title: Peers

panels.description: The number of healthy nodes in excess of quorum
panels.title: Failure tolerance

panels.description: Measures the time since the leader was last able to contact the follower nodes when checking its leader lease
panels.title: Leader last contacted

panels.description: Time required for the leader node to write a log entry to disk
panels.title: Raft dispatch log

panels.description: Time required to invoke `appendEntries` on a peer so the peer does not time out
panels.title: Raft replication heartbeat

panels.description: The time it takes for a Raft transaction to be replicated to a quorum of followers
panels.title: Raft append entries

panels.description: This panel should show no activity in a stable cluster. Some leadership transition events are expected such as during cluster upgrades. Unexpected events may indicate an issue with cluster stability
panels.title: Election events

panels.description: Time difference between when a message was first passed into Raft and when the resulting commit took place on the leader
panels.title: Raft commit time

panels.description: Time it takes for a server to apply Raft entries to the internal state machine.
panels.title: Raft fsm apply

panels.description: Number of mounts in the given mount table
panels.title: Mount table

panels.description:
The current size of the relevant mount table.  
Integrated storage default (1 MiB): ~14000
panels.title: Mount table size
